definitions.definition: A red-orange dye obtained from brazil wood.
The hard, brown wood of a certain species of the tribe Caesalpinieae ; originally sappan ( Biancaea sappan ), of the East Indies, and later brazilwood , Paubrasilia echinata .

examples: I picked up a handful of brazils from the bowl.

definitions.definition: A seam of coal containing iron pyrites

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A red-orange dye obtained from brazil wood. [14th–17th c.]
secondary_definitions: The hard, brown wood of a certain species of the tribe Caesalpinieae ; originally sappan ( Biancaea sappan ), of the East Indies, and later brazilwood , Paubrasilia echinata . [from 15th c.]
A seam of coal containing iron pyrites
